scripts.merge: gh pr create --fill-first; gh pr view && ./gradlew buildHealth build && gh run watch --exit-status && gh pr merge --squash --delete-branch --auto
scripts.release: git push --tags && gh release create v$npm_config_semver --generate-notes build/libs/*.jar --verify-tag
scripts.release:dry-run: npm run release:prepare && git tag -d v$npm_config_semver
scripts.release:prepare: git tag -m $npm_config_semver -a v$npm_config_semver && ./gradlew build && ./gradlew clean assemble shadowJar
